p: Our results also suggest that hsa-miR-655-3p, which has higher expression in mutated tumors, may affect expression levels of GAS1. The protein encoded by this gene is a negative regulator of the cell cycle and is considered a tumor suppressor in gastric and colorectal cancer [ 35, 36]. It is known that corticotroph PitNETs with a distinct USP8 status differ in the expression status of cell cycle regulators at gene and protein level [ 1, 2, 15].
